attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I need to understand why as a single mum i am finding it very difficult to go back to work, I have a partime job in highschool as a dinner lady, more than half of what i earn is taken off me again, I work 7.5 hours weekly, if i do any less than 16 hours i work for very little money, I enjoy my job but as of now the school do not need me for longer hours, so i have to work for the equivalant of about £2.30 per hour less than minimum wage, please help me to understand this

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
